title: Kim K Breakup, Voting, Pimpin' Instant Picks, Workplace Germs, Steve's VM and more.
itunes:title: Kim K Breakup, Voting, Pimpin' Instant Picks, Workplace Germs, Steve's VM and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  Steve gots a recommendation just for you or for the whole family.  The CLO addressed self-respect and entrepreneurship today.  Irv Gotti pulls a grimey move putting Ashanti out there like that.  The DOJ finally gave Breonna Taylor some justice.  Judge Steve explains what a "bought" lesson is to man who lost a friend over a fender bender as he checks his voicemail.  Pimpin' stops by to give us his instant picks.  Millenials spoke out as to how you know you are wealthy by being in possession of these certain items.  Lysol posted some facts about what parts of the workplace are filled with the most germs.  Lost phones, a sail boat and bird attacks were among the topics covered in Would You Rather.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve reminds us that you can't google success or experience

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
